rules.prepare: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/config \ --prefix=/usr \ --openssldir=/usr/lib/ssl \ --libdir=lib \ \ no-idea no-mdc2 no-rc5 no-zlib no-ssl3 no-ssl3-method \ no-async enable-rfc3779 enable-cms
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl"
for item in certs openssl.cnf private; do mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib/ssl/$item" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl/" ln -s "/etc/ssl/$item" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib/ssl/" done
chmod 0700 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl/private"
